descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Bam Adebayo tries to throw down a dunk inside, but Ivica Zubac swats the shot away.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Zubac rejects Bam's dunk attempt) 2022/01/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Zubac rejects Bam's dunk attempt

videos.description: Jimmy Butler sneaks in to steal the ball and then takes it all the way for a dunk on the other end.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jimmy Butler steals and slams for the Heat) 2022/01/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jimmy Butler steals and slams for the Heat

videos.description: Jimmy Butler maneuvers around Reggie Jackson down low to scoop it home.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jimmy Butler goes to work in the paint to score) 2022/01/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jimmy Butler goes to work in the paint to score

videos.description: Jimmy Butler picks off a pass on defense then dishes to Max Strus for a 3-pointer in transition.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Butler's steal turns into 3 points for the Heat) 2022/01/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Butler's steal turns into 3 points for the Heat
